column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My husband isn't the type to get enthusiastic over brush strokes (but would definitely enjoy cracking a joke over the word "stroke
column2: ) but he enjoyed himself by making up his own names for various works of art which varied in creativity from "I call this blue!"  to "I call this X."  If you aren't into art
column3: at least have a sense of humor
column4: and you will enjoy yourself here.
